document_data.caption: Fazrian sitting in judgement, with Raxxus beside it.
document_data.name: Fazrian
document_data.mainbody: '''Fazrian''' was an evil [[planetar]] who ruled the [[Terminus Level]] of [[Undermountain]].
document_data.History:
Fazrian originally served [[Torm]], until being called down by a [[cleric]] in Undermountain.

Arriving there, Fazrian was disgusted by the corruption and sought to cleanse it. Fazrian failed to realize it was slowly becoming more bloodthirsty and eventually slaughtered the cleric who had summoned it, along with her companions.

Fazrian then proceeded to take control of the Terminus Level. [[Halaster Blackcloak]] sent Fazrian a host of four [[yugoloth]]s to command, in exchange for payment. The four included the [[arcanaloth]]s [[Aximus]] and [[Exekarus]], the [[ultroloth]] [[Xindulus]], and the [[nycaloth]] [[Raxxus]].
